title: About Me
subtitle: Fullstack Developer
leftContent: I am a Fullstack Developer focused on building scalable, high-performance web applications by combining clean frontend experiences with reliable backend systems. I work across the entire development lifecycleâ€”from designing intuitive user interfaces to implementing secure APIs and managing databases.
rightContent: My expertise includes modern JavaScript frameworks, server-side development, and data-driven architectures. I emphasize code quality, performance optimization, and maintainability, ensuring that applications are both efficient and future-ready. Driven by continuous learning and real-world problem solving, I enjoy translating complex requirements into practical digital solutions. I am particularly interested in developing applications that deliver measurable value through thoughtful design, solid engineering, and seamless user interaction.
